    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public static boolean initialize(boolean useNewIO)
        Initializes this abstract class's ServerImplementation instance to a default implementation using either Java's New or Old IO API.

        This method initializes the server using a default NIO or OIO implementation (from OldIO_Server or NewIO_Server) with a randomly generated port allocation.

        Resolving the old server implementation via the ServerImplementation.killServer() method is left as a task for the user.

        Parameters:
        useNewIO - Whether to use Java's New or Old IO API
        Returns:
        true, if the current server was replaced (as outlined in initialize(Supplier)'s documentation; otherwise, false
        See Also:
        initialize(Supplier), NewIO_Server, OldIO_Server, ServerImplementation, ServerImplementation.killServer()

      • initialize

        public static boolean initialize(boolean useNewIO,
                                 int port)
        Initializes this abstract class's ServerImplementation instance to a default implementation using either Java's New or Old IO API.

        This method initializes the server using a default NIO or OIO implementation (from OldIO_Server or NewIO_Server) with the specified networking port.

        Resolving the old server implementation via the ServerImplementation.killServer() method is left as a task for the user.

        Parameters:
        useNewIO - Whether to use Java's New or Old IO API
        port - The port to use for creating the ServerImplementation
        Returns:
        true, if the current server was replaced (as outlined in initialize(Supplier)'s documentation; otherwise, false
        See Also:
        initialize(Supplier), NewIO_Server, OldIO_Server, ServerImplementation, ServerImplementation.killServer()

      • initialize

        public static boolean initialize(Supplier<ServerImplementation> server)
        Initializes this abstract class's ServerImplementation instance to the provided implementation, provided it is not null.

        Resolving the old server implementation via the ServerImplementation.killServer() method is left as a task for the user.

        Parameters:
        server - A supplier which provides a new ServerImplementation
        Returns:
        true, if the provided ServerImplementation is not null; otherwise, false
        See Also:
        ServerImplementation, ServerImplementation.killServer()

      • exists

        public static boolean exists()

      • getAddress

        public static NetworkAddress getAddress()
        Returns the information necessary for connecting clients to this server.

        This method is a static wrapper for the ServerImplementation.getAddress() method.

        Returns:
        This ServerImplementation's corresponding NetworkAddress
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the static ServerImplementation was not initialized
        See Also:
        NetworkAddress, ServerImplementation, ServerImplementation.getAddress()
